content: 1. Despite reports to the contrary, Hue Jackson doesn’t sound like he’s about to draft a first-round quarterback. They’ve needed a franchise QB basically forever, but the Browns traded the second-overall pick instead of selecting either Jared Goff or Carson Wentz. With the first and 12th picks this year, the Browns will have multiple opportunities at guys like Mitch Trubisky, Deshaun Watson, and Deshone Kizer, but their head coach indicated they’d be looking elsewhere come April.
